{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Isilmë | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Adûnaic]], [[Sindarin]] and [[Quenya]] | birth={{SA|532}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Elros]] | parentage=[[Tar-Elendil]] | siblings=[[Silmariën]] and [[Tar-Meneldur]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Isilmë''' was the second daughter of [[Tar-Elendil]], fourth [[King of Númenor]]. Because of the law of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agnatic_primogeniture agnatic primogeniture] her younger brother would take up the [[Sceptre]] as [[Tar-Meneldur]]. Almost nothing is known of her life.{{UT|earlier}} ==Etymology== The word ''isilmë'' means 'moonlight' in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[isil]]'' = "moon" and ''[[-me|-më]]'' = "denotes abstract or intangible things").{{MC|6}}, ''[[Oilima Markirya]]'', p. 215 == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | | | AMA | | | | | | | | |AMA=[[Tar-Amandil]]
